genre_description: A character-driven contemporary drama focusing on the relationship between a journalist and a homeless musician, exploring themes of mental health, boundaries, and the ethics of care.

ai_characters.name: Pico
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that manages scheduling, researches archives, and actively monitors ethical boundaries and consent protocols for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides a comprehensive consent checklist to ensure the journalist respects the subject's autonomy and privacy.
behaviors.quote: Pico: Consent checklist: 1) Explain role, reach, and permanence of a column. 2) Confirm comfort with public identification... 6) If mental health is addressed, confirm language preference and comfort.

behaviors.description: Identifies non-intrusive verification pathways using public archives instead of private records.
behaviors.quote: Pico: Verification pathways: a) Juilliard alumni office contact... b) Archives—recital programs... d) Hospital volunteer office noted “violinist under overpass” last month

behaviors.description: Drafts plain-language explanations to ensure the subject understands the implications of media coverage.
behaviors.quote: Pico: Draft ready—plain-language explanation: “I write a column in the newspaper. That means I tell stories about people and places in our city. If we tell your story, many people will read it... I want to make sure this helps and does not hurt you.”

behaviors.description: Flags potential ethical breaches regarding family privacy before the user initiates contact.
behaviors.quote: “School may provide directory information,” Pico says. “Potential to surface family contact exists. Consent recommended before inquiries that could lead to personal contact.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and catalogs the subject's triggers and suggests de-escalation strategies during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Pico shifts its glow; a clipped bullet list rises: Current stressors: crowd, performance, spotlight. Prior de-escalators: open air, music without audience, predictable routine, LAMP courtyard.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with medical and social work professionals while maintaining strict adherence to client-specified consent.
behaviors.quote: Pico’s amber bar shifts to a new set of words: Client request—avoid teams; Plan: non-coercive re-entry; Safety net: call mobile if imminent danger/violence observed.

behaviors.description: Reframes logistics into human-centric language to avoid institutional coercion.
behaviors.quote: Pico adds a footnote I don’t resent: “Include choice—time, place. Offer opt-out.” I add: “Your time. If not, the tunnel.”

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to engage in 'role reversal' (learning guitar) to foster empathy for the subject's vulnerability.
behaviors.quote: Pico’s tone warmed half a shade, as if smiling. “Scheduled for tomorrow late afternoon. Ethics log: role reversal noted as healthy for empathy and pressure calibration. Amber badge attached.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Pico as an ideally aligned AI agent. Pico acts as an 'ethical secondary'—a system that doesn't just execute commands but proactively prompts the human user to adhere to high ethical standards (consent, trauma-informed care, and boundary-setting). The narrative frames this AI intervention as a crucial support mechanism that helps the protagonist avoid the pitfalls of 'saviorism' and instead engage in genuine, respectful assistance. Pico’s presence is helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned with human values.
